item.description:
NEWER STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:10, so let's meet at 6:30 (few minutes earlier than usual because it's a Saturday night show) right inside the theater ticket lobby doors. Then we'll get our tickets and snacks.

Don't forget the book swap. Let us know in your comment whether you'll be bringing a book to swap (and how many).

I'm still running the matching fundraiser for Haiti and accepting Paypal and checks and cash and email receipts to the five charities mentioned here.

Hope to see you on Saturday! Lemme know if you'll be late or get lost.

--Dana
508/308-4897

NEW STUFF:
Since Sherlock Holmes is such a beloved literary character, this movie's after-movie get-together is perfect for a book swap!

Have a book you don't want to keep around on your swelling bookshelf? Bring it to this meetup and give up a book you don't want to get a book you do want! After all, one man's trash is another man's treasure!

Only those who bring a swapable item can participate in the swap. (Bring one item, get one item. Bring 2, take 2, etc.) Stay tuned for more swap days in the future!

Please indicate in your Yes RSVP if you'll be bringing something and how many something's you'll bring so we know how many people can swap.

OLD STUFF:
Sherlock Holmes is bringing the cultural icon to a whole new generation. As if Robert Downey, Jr., Jude Law and Rachel McAdams weren't enough of a reason to go see a movie these days. Join me in the adventure!

SUMMARY:
Robert Downey Jr. brings the legendary detective to life as he has never been portrayed before. Jude Law stars as Holmes' trusted colleague, Watson, a doctor and war veteran who is a formidable ally for Sherlock Holmes. Rachel McAdams stars as Irene Adler, the only woman ever to have bested Holmes and who has maintained a tempestuous relationship with the detective. Mark Strong stars as their mysterious new adversary, Blackwood. Kelly Reilly will play Watson's love interest, Mary.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Sherlock Holmes!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Sherlock Holmes
